commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Heeey everybody!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh! You's here! Over this way!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: *Giggle* Sorry to keep you all waiting! I was so excited to see you guys and the cryptid, I rushed all the way here! So, did you guys find it yet?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sadly, not yet. And we've got nothin' on land either... I'm not saying I thought it'd be easy to find, but it's a pretty small needle in a huge haystack.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I went diving a few times to look for it, but I didn't see anything out of the ordinary.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Nothing by land or by sea, huh? Guess all that's left is the sky.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The sky? Y-You mean, we're gonna fly?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yeah! I mean, you can see super far out from the sky. I'll bet we could see way further out than we could from the shore or from the ocean.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I see! Yeah, if we're in the sky it'd be way easier to see if it's floating around in the ocean or hanging out on a rock or on the shore somewhere!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: But...how exactly are we gonna get up into the sky?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's look up what the next plane that flies over this area is and buy tickets for it!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: We could charter a helicopter! Oh, hang on, Mari already has one, huh? Man, we should've asked Mari to come!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: H-Hold up! There's no way we can arrange for a plane or a helicopter!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Hmm, what about this? I did a quick search and apparently, they're letting people go on parasailing adventures right around here.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Parasailing? Isn't that the thing where you ride on a parachute pulled by a motorboat or something?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I bet that would totally let us see across the ocean! Let's have ourselves an adventure!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Parachute fitted and secured! Is everyone ready?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yup. This is my first time parasailing. My heart's pounding...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's not every day you get to see the ocean from high up in the sky. I'm so excited!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Oh, looks like it's starting! Let's go on a sky-high adventure!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh gosh! I'm really flying! Wow, it's like I'm one with the wind!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Eek! Th-This is so high up!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I can see all the way over the horizon! This feels amazing!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I can see so far out over the town! Yoohoo! Aye aye! Hahaha, they probably can't hear me, huh?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's just blue as far as the eye can see! Man, the ocean is just the best!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Phew, that was so fun!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I know! Flying is a blast. It's as fun as diving in the ocean!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It felt so good, soaring against the wind! I wanna do it again!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: My spirits were pretty much soaring too! I wonder if they'll let us go again right after?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Whimper* ...My knees are shaking so badly... I was so scared of falling into the ocean that I couldn't even open my eyes...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hanayo, are you okay?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I had so much fun! Hm? Hey, why did we go parasailing in the first place? Oh!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: S-Sorry! I totally forgot about the cryptid!
